title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 628/95 of 23 March 1995 fixing the amount of the aid referred to in Council Regulation (EEC) No 804/68 for the private storage of butter and cream
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 628/95 of 23 March 1995 fixing the amount of the aid referred to in Council Regulation (EEC) No 804/68 for the private storage of butter and cream
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 15 April 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 March 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
